p: We also tested the impacts of each driver of change on each tree species. Percentage differences in simulated AGB (Î”B) between simulations run under the full model and those run under each reduced model were calculated at each time step for each species. These analyses are similar to those conducted by Boulanger et al. [ 30]. All pre- and post-model data processing and analyses were conducted using R version 3.3.0 [ 84].
